pkgmetadata.longdescription: Proximal Causal Learning // We fit causal models using proxies. We implement two stage proximal least squares estimator. E.J. Tchetgen Tchetgen, A. Ying, Y. Cui, X. Shi, and W. Miao. (2020). An Introduction to Proximal Causal Learning. arXiv e-prints, arXiv-2009 arXiv:2009.10982.
